entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
